title: Sales of the leading 15 optical retailers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Optical retailer, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Optical retailer on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars 2840.0 is found at Optical retailer Vision Source and the minimum is found at Emerging Vision Inc. where Optical retailer is 110.4.
The difference of Sales in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Optical retailer is 2729.6.

max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Optical retailer, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Optical retailer on the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Optical retailer Vision Source and lowest at Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc..
The second highest Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Optical retailer Luxottica retail.
The difference of Sales in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Optical retailer is 2729.6.
Sales in million U.S. dollars at Optical retailer Vision Source is 2840.0 , second place is Luxottica retail at 2470.0, and thirdly is Walmart stores at 1762.0.
Considered together, the average Sales in million U.S. dollars in all 15 Optical retailers is roughly 873.27.
